titleStmt.title: The Christians comfort In a sermon appointed for the crosse, but preached in S. Pauls Church on Candlemas day, 1623. By Thomas Myriell, rector of S. Steuens in Walbrooke London.
titleStmt.author: Myriell, Thomas, d. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.P[urslowe] for Iohn White, and are to bee sold at his shop in little Brittaine, at the signe of the holy Lambe, neere vnto Aldersgate streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
